name: genie-logiciel
description: Course for Genie Lociel in Paris Descartes

scripts.reveal:css: cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/css/reveal.css | cleancss -O2 -o web/vendor/reveal.css && cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/css/theme/night.css | grep -v -E "^@import" | grep -v -E "font-family:.*?sans-serif" | cleancss -O2 -o web/vendor/night.css && cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/lib/css/zenburn.css | cleancss -O2 -o web/vendor/zenburn.css && cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/css/print/paper.css | cleancss -O2 -o web/vendor/paper.css
scripts.reveal:js: uglifyjs ./node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/markdown/markdown.js --compress --mangle --output web/vendor/markdown.js && uglifyjs ./node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/markdown/marked.js --compress --mangle --output web/vendor/marked.js && uglifyjs ./node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/highlight/highlight.js --compress --mangle --output web/vendor/highlight.js && uglifyjs ./node_modules/reveal.js/js/reveal.js --compress --mangle --output web/vendor/reveal.js
scripts.reveal: mkdir -p web/vendor && npm run reveal:copy && npm run reveal:css && npm run reveal:js
scripts.start: ALGOLIA_APP=H35CS6IJ9J ALGOLIA_KEY=${ALGOLIA_KEY} ALGOLIA_INDEX=l3miage ENVIRONMENT=dev viws-light -tls=false -directory ${INIT_CWD}/web/ -csp "default-src 'self'; base-uri 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' cdn.jsdelivr.net/algoliasearch/3/; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' *.algolia.net *.algolianet.com api.rollbar.com; child-src www.youtube.com" -env ALGOLIA_APP,ALGOLIA_KEY,ALGOLIA_INDEX,ENVIRONMENT

author: Vincent Boutour <bob@vibioh.fr>
